__e: They think they know better... Never again! Never!
Since fate binds us to each other I wonder if I might photograph you
I've told you not to drink in front of mama's photograph.
So I left my job as a photographer and set out to make a film about them, but they were gone.
Your picture and your file have been on my desk for months. I have the feeling I know you a bit.
As your little friend here pointed out last night you're way behind schedule and way over budget both of which we could live with if the footage were a dream.
